content:
Downtown LA! I've got you covered.

For mechanics, I've found a few options near you that are open on weekends:

1. **Pep Boys** - 1231 S Figueroa St, Los Angeles, CA 90015 (open Saturday 8am-6pm, Sunday 9am-5pm)
2. **Jiffy Lube** - 1313 S Hope St, Los Angeles, CA 90015 (open Saturday 8am-6pm, Sunday 9am-5pm)
3. **Valvoline Instant Oil Change** - 444 S Main St, Los Angeles, CA 90013 (open Saturday 8am-6pm, Sunday 9am-5pm)
4. **Downtown LA Auto Repair** - 1425 S San Pedro St, Los Angeles, CA 90015 (open Saturday 9am-5pm, Sunday 10am-4pm)

Please note that hours may be subject to change, so it's always a good idea to call ahead to confirm.

Now, about that coffee shop near the train station... I'm intrigued! Which one have you been trying out? There are a few great options near the LA Union Station, such as:

1. **The Coffee Colab** - 801 N Vignes St, Los Angeles, CA 90012 (inside the LA Union Station)
2. **Cafe Demitasse** - 135 N San Pedro St, Los Angeles, CA 90012 (just a block away from the train station)
3. **Blue Bottle Coffee** - 806 S Broadway, Los Angeles, CA 90014 (about a 10-minute walk from the train station)

If you're willing to share, I'd love to know which one you've been enjoying!

Let me know if there's anything else I can help you with!
